headline.main: Honda Says Not Considering New Lending to Takata
headline.print_headline: Honda Says Not Considering New Lending to Takata

docs.snippet: Honda Motor Co. said on Monday it was not considering fresh lending to Takata Corp, the auto parts supplier at the center of a global recall over faulty airbag inflators, either on its own or as part of a group of Japanese automakers....
docs.lead_paragraph: Honda Motor Co. said on Monday it was not considering fresh lending to Takata Corp, the auto parts supplier at the center of a global recall over faulty airbag inflators, either on its own or as part of a group of Japanese automakers.

headline.main: Mark Zuckerberg Unveils 2016 Plans for Artificially Intelligent Butler
headline.print_headline: Mark Zuckerberg Unveils 2016 Plans for Artificially Intelligent Butler

docs.snippet: Mark Zuckerberg wants to build an artificially intelligent assistant in 2016 to help run his home and assist him at work, the Facebook Inc founder and chief executive said on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mark Zuckerberg wants to build an artificially intelligent assistant in 2016 to help run his home and assist him at work, the Facebook Inc founder and chief executive said on Sunday.

headline.main: Barca's Turan and Vidal Ready for Espanyol Cup Clash
headline.print_headline: Barca's Turan and Vidal Ready for Espanyol Cup Clash

docs.snippet: Barcelona can call on Arda Turan and Aleix Vidal for the first time after a FIFA-imposed ban on the club registering new players as they seek to breach Espanyol’s resilient defence in the King’s Cup on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Barcelona can call on Arda Turan and Aleix Vidal for the first time after a FIFA-imposed ban on the club registering new players as they seek to breach Espanyol’s resilient defence in the King’s Cup on Wednesday.

headline.main: Jagr Scores 2 Goals, Panthers Beat Wild 2-1 for 9th Straight
headline.print_headline: Jagr Scores 2 Goals, Panthers Beat Wild 2-1 for 9th Straight

docs.snippet: Jaromir Jagr scored two goals, including the game-winner in the third period, and Al Montoya made 38 saves as the streaking Florida Panthers beat the Minnesota Wild 2-1 on Sunday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Jaromir Jagr scored two goals, including the game-winner in the third period, and Al Montoya made 38 saves as the streaking Florida Panthers beat the Minnesota Wild 2-1 on Sunday.

headline.main: Hobbling Serena Ruled Out of Opening Hopman Cup Tie
headline.print_headline: Hobbling Serena Ruled Out of Opening Hopman Cup Tie

docs.snippet: World number one Serena Williams was ruled out of her opening match at the Hopman Cup mixed team event in Perth on Monday because of inflammation of the knee, organizers said....
docs.lead_paragraph: World number one Serena Williams was ruled out of her opening match at the Hopman Cup mixed team event in Perth on Monday because of inflammation of the knee, organizers said.

headline.main: Brathwaite Shines Before Rain Intervenes Again
headline.print_headline: Brathwaite Shines Before Rain Intervenes Again

docs.snippet: West Indies were 248 for seven in their first innings when rain interrupted play once again, half an hour after lunch on the second day of the third test against Australia on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: West Indies were 248 for seven in their first innings when rain interrupted play once again, half an hour after lunch on the second day of the third test against Australia on Monday.

headline.main: Abe Says Japan No Longer in Deflation, Economy on Recovery Path
headline.print_headline: Abe Says Japan No Longer in Deflation, Economy on Recovery Path

docs.snippet: Prime Minister Shinzo Abe said on Monday that Japan was exiting deflation and pledged that his government and the central bank would work together to completely defeat it....
docs.lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Shinzo Abe said on Monday that Japan was exiting deflation and pledged that his government and the central bank would work together to completely defeat it.

headline.main: Japan December Final Manufacturing PMI Steady at 52.6, Orders Pick Up
headline.print_headline: Japan December Final Manufacturing PMI Steady at 52.6, Orders Pick Up

docs.snippet: Tokyo - Japanese manufacturing activity expanded in December at the same pace as the previous month as new orders grew at a faster rate in a sign the economy maintained momentum at the end of 2015, a revised survey showed on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Tokyo - Japanese manufacturing activity expanded in December at the same pace as the previous month as new orders grew at a faster rate in a sign the economy maintained momentum at the end of 2015, a revised survey showed on Monday.

headline.main: Bosh Has 23, Leads Heat Over Wizards 97-75
headline.print_headline: Bosh Has 23, Leads Heat Over Wizards 97-75

docs.snippet: The Washington Wizards came to Miami last month and scored 114 points in a win over the Heat. That's the most points Miami has allowed this season....
